Our Products

NRN Saving Deposit Account
Interest Rate: , Minimum Balance: USD 5000

NBL Pioneer Saving Deposit Account
Interest Rate: 4.50%, Minimum Balance: NPR 10,000

NBL Special Saving Account
Interest Rate: 3.50%, Minimum Balance: NPR 1,000

Sahayatri Bachat khata
Interest Rate: 2.75%, Minimum Balance: 500


View All Products

  • Minimum balance of USD 1000.00  or GBP 900 or AUD 1600
  • Such account can be opened and operated by NRN (either single or joint or minor  account) or institution promoted by NRN but located in abroad. 
  • Amount should be deposited and withdrawn through banking system only in such account.
  • Easy repayment of interest in foreign or local currency.
  • Free Internet banking facility for 1 year.
  • 50% discount in locker facility for account holder(Upon availability).
  • Facility of easy account opening from anywhere around the world through online 
  • Special premium (0.25 paisa) on foreign currency exchange.
  • Free travel card issuance.
Read More

  • Minimum Balance Rs.10000.00
  • Age eligibility – 18 years or more
  • Free mobile banking & internet banking registration for 1 year
  • Free VISA debit card issuance for first year
  • 50% discount on locker facility for 1 year (upon availability)
  • 100% discount on credit card issuance fee (subject to eligibility)
  • Free DEMAT & Mero share registration  charge for 1st year

 

 

Read More

  • Minimum balance: NPR 1,000.
  • VISA Debit Card,  NBL Smart Mobile Banking, Internet Banking, Demat Account opening, C-ASBA and Mero Share registration
Read More

  • Minimum balance NPR 500 only.
  • Joint account for spouse or couple (husband and wife)
  • Free VISA Debit Card, NBL Smart Mobile Banking and Internet Banking
  • 25% discount in locker facility
  • Free NTC Prepaid SIM Card for both with the initial package of 100 MB data, 10  minutes on net talk time and 10 on net SMS every day for 1 month from the date of SIM activation
  • Additional 1 GB data for 1 month after the expiry of initial package (condition applied)
  • No internet charge for NBL Mobile Banking browsing using the provided NTC SIM for 1 year
Read More
